website_summaries.verdict: Sony's MDR-1A over-ear headphones are luxurious-feeling, exceptionally comfortable, and deliver top-notch audio performance.
pros: Fantastic audio performance with deep lows and clear, well-defined highs
Ships with two detachable cables, one with an inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Not for purists seeking a flat response sound signature

customer_reviews.title: These are really good!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought ( and sold) countless headphones since discovering streamed music, never quite attaining satisfaction- there was always something that disappointed. Im nervous to say this...but it looks like I've finally found a pair I can keep. I know there's headphones selling at multiples of the price of these but for now ..I'm not interested
customer_reviews.author: ActingDanClarke

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great audio, bad construction details.
customer_reviews.text: Audio is pretty good and they are very comfortable, good levels of isolation. The only problem is the squeaky sound coming from the plastic ear cup rubbing against headband. It can be very annoying depending on how much you are moving, it is enough to turn your head from one side to the other for the headphones to start squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo ruiz

customer_reviews.title: simple headphones with good sound
customer_reviews.text: brought these on a deal from amazon warehouse and they are a much better set of headphones than the sony ch700n wireless headphones as they are they have a much more balanced sound than the wireless headphones and are also more comfortable to wear and no annoying beeps that the 700s produced .so if you want a decent set of not very expensive headphones go for these via a warehouse deal
customer_reviews.author: R970

customer_reviews.title: Nice bassy sound - If only they worked for more than 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: For someone that isn't that fussed on bass (in the past I've had reproduction based headphones) I'm quite taken by these, bought them on a warehouse deal for about £69, work perfectly, very happy with the purchase in all regards.... Bought them in April 2019... It's now 04/12/2019 and the headphone jack socket (on left earcup) keeps playing up and cutting out the right ear cup, bought a new cable thinking it was that but getting exactly the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: HokiKoki

customer_reviews.title: not good sound isolation as others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium sized head but these felt loose, not good sound isolation as others have mentioned. Clear sound and a good sound stage but bass can be overwhelming. Not for me returned due to fit and sound. Just to note my Senny HD202 sound better than these and were bought for £20 may not be made as well but great sounding without the unexpected bass the Sony's can project at times.
customer_reviews.author: YabbaDabbaDoo

customer_reviews.title: I've had these cans since 2016 and was initially super impressed. The sound quality remains great but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these cans since 2016 and was initially super impressed. The sound quality remains great but I have a major problem with the build quality. After a few months some of the plastic parts started to squeak/rub a little but it wasn't too much of an issue, even though it was annoying. Unfortunately the problem got worse and now, while I can use them at my desk when sitting still, I can't walk around in the things because they squeak so annoyingly. This is a shame as the actual sound they produce is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. J. Solly

customer_reviews.title: Good audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Paired them with my new Sony Walkman NW-A45 and they sound excellent, music feels like listening in a recording studio (with the appropriate equalizer settings of course). They also sound good on the PC and smartphone. And the design is also nice, got a lot of compliments. Was tired with the standard black headphones so I chose silver. I can wear them outside without feeling (too) geeky. They are comfortable in every aspect, minus the fact that my ears sometimes get sweaty while wearing them outside (but that happens with any over-years). I had to choose between these and Audio-Technica ATH-MSR7, and I'm very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Superior audio quality, well designed and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: After over 30 days of using the product, it still continues to impress me with its superior audio quality (they weren't joking about the High-Res Audio). I've compared it alongside a pair of Bose QC 25s. While the Bose has really (really!) good noise isolation, the audio quality of the MDR-1Rs are still noticeably superior. I was skeptical when I first bought the product, being on the verge of returning it due to no volume control function for iOS devices (or any devices in that manner), and having never bought any Sony headphones before, the Sony MDR-1Rs definitely gave me a great impression of the company's audio products. Would recommend to anyone with a little extra pocket money to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Chew Xin Jet

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had these for over a year and recently left them on a plane forcing me to find a new pair of headphones. There is one problem, I have not found anything as good as these, even paying twice as much or more, they are superb. Coupled with my MacBook, my iPod or my Android phone I have never had such clear sound. So, I shall be forced to shell out for a new pair just to get that performance back again.
customer_reviews.author: nigelsphotos

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for using with a computer but end up mostly using them for music Pros: - sound quality is excellent (to my ears) and makes a variety of music very pleasing to listen to. Very comfy and have a nice design. Cons: noise isolation is pretty poor - you need a fairly quiet room / high volume to avoid distractions creeping in. Proprietary cable is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Quality all the way.
customer_reviews.text: Always been a big fan of the higher-end Sony 'phones. When I got them out of the (very plush) box I was a little disappointed at how light they felt. I was dead wrong. They've kept all the big warm sound but made them light enough to wear plugged into a phone on the move. Perfect for DJing too if like me you like to monitor enclosed and the cups provide really good isolation. OK they are a little on the posh side for DJing ;) Highly recommended by an audio professional.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Man.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy listening
customer_reviews.text: i used this in conjunction with a antilion mic to make it a computer headset. It works amazing, and is very comfortable for hours of wear. If you want Bass, this isn't the headset for you. Where it has some bass, its not a overall bass feel. However, i think this is a good thing as you get comfort, another wire for connecting to a phone, and a nice little bag for it. The packaging was very luxurious and a massive surprise. Overall a great experience and hoping to use them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very short cables.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving these 3 stars because both the supplied cables are ridiculously short. I had to move the headphone amplifier nearer to my sitting position to be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, now that I have the right cable to connect them to my micro hifi system. The bass and treble are quite noticeable without ruining the sound quality. The build quality does look a bit on cheap side but I don't care so long as the sound is good. Well worth forking out a few extra quid for the sound quality alone. Just a thought, its maybe just as well they look cheap they are less likely to be stolen.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: In terms of transaction with the seller, no problems at all. However, in terms of the product I have to say I regret my purchase. The sound and comfort are good, but after slightly more than a year of using them, they are basically falling apart. After half a year I had already gone through both cables (not lost, but weren't working anymore), didn't think too much of it and bought a replacement cable. After slightly more than a year the leather is coming apart on the left earpad. Considering the price, I really expected much better quality. I wouldn't recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Bass. Ok. Too much. Middle ok. Treble ok. It's perfect. Price is very good. Comfortable and lightweight. Buy it! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Petrus Petrache

customer_reviews.title: Just suit my need
customer_reviews.text: I think it is the best headphone compare to other production(MSR7,etc) that lays on the same price level. Just for notice, when I mean same price level, 1A is actually is the cheapest one and it is in discount now in amazon. If you listen all kinds of music in the daily life, then you should have an 1A with you. Coz the sound is all balanced, not only the bass part,but also the high-freq sound performence. It could be considered as an entry headphone for HIFI beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ren

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: Pros The sound: Just amazing. The bass, mids and treble are all solid and beautiful. Material: Quite high in quality and stylish looking. Also SUPER comfortable, easily one of the most comfortable headphones out there. Cons Noise isolation: There is almost no noise isolation in these headphones. It is not a promoted feature anyway, but still it is disappointing. I even have difficulty listening to some music on a bus. Except for the lack of noise isolation, these cans are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Geratcha

customer_reviews.title: ... a recent over ear headphone user and I just love them. Not a very strong sound when using ...
customer_reviews.text: I am just a recent over ear headphone user and I just love them. Not a very strong sound when using with the phone, but really clear and good bass. They are realy loud and clear when using with my laptop and very confortable to wear for hours. Highly reccomend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones - Sony are top tier anyway, but for the price I paid for these, £114 (minus 30 quid amazon voucher) these were a steal. Extremely well built and sound quality is superb. I use these for listening to music as well as gaming, they're far better than my Steelseries
customer_reviews.author: Scrag

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is my first expensive set of headphones so I can't really compare them, that said I'm really happy with my purchase. They are VERY comfortable, I can wear them all day without any issues. The pads are big and do a pretty good job at blocking indoor sounds. the headphones are light and the build quality is great, no scratches tear after 2 month with this. Now to the sound, look I'm not an expert but the sound is...amazing, really, If you're like me and like all kinds of music ranging from rock to electronic you'll be happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ofek.m

customer_reviews.title: Buy these there great
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a year since these headphones came out wondering if i should get them. I kept hopeing that they would get reduced but they never did. I eventually decided to get them. And these are fantastic alot better then the MDR1R which was my last model. If you want good sound don't delay and get them today. There also very comfortable as can wear thema day without noticeing!
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. I don't consider my self an audiophile, and have never purchased proper quality headphones. As a result, I found myself constantly purchasing new, cheap, headphones/earbuds, as they would never last for long. I finally decided to buy these cause of reviews I found online combined with the price. I had a plane trip planned a few days after I bought these and was a bit worried by reviews online that claim they don't have good sound isolation, but was really pleasantly surprised by their performance in such a noisy environment. Needless to say, I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is out of this planet.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is perfect, and a quite good bass, there is some people that says this bass is too much, but I find it just perfect. So comfy as well, you can use them for hours and don't feel them at all. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Flatley88

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality for the price, I have comparable price Sennheisers and they are so much clearer, and they are very uncomfortable for long periods
customer_reviews.author: George Jane

customer_reviews.title: great set with deep clear sound and classy looks
customer_reviews.text: The overall experience is great. The fit is excellent, they are so comfortable to wear that i put them on and just forget they exist... the sound is also great, with deep bass and clear prima, the design is just incredible(!) the look and feel very luxurious... if they were a bit cheaper they would be a 5-star no-match...
customer_reviews.author: Vangelis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones but expensive cables.
customer_reviews.text: +. Good headphones, the sound is really good! -. The head bar material is delicate and fragile I scratched mine slightly just with my bare nails. Summary: After 3 years of ownership (2018) I have used MDR1A for my daily listening and they have gone through a lot. Recently the microphone cable has become defective and after contacting an official supplier I was surprised to see the cable at the value of £50.. I'll wait until the MK2 are released
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Cable broke after relatively little use and ridiculous charge for a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but the left hand channel of the cable (to connect them to a phone) stopped working after being used for quite a short period of time. Unfortunately the headphones were a few months out of their one year warranty although this cable hasn't been used much, it had only started to be used recently. I contacted Sony and they charge £52.30+VAT (£62.76) for a replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: good 8 out of ten
customer_reviews.text: Looks goods, sounds good feels good. only disadvantage is after wearing it after a while, it gets a bit warm and hurt your ears. and if you not worn headphones before, it takes a while to get used to that warm feeling.
customer_reviews.author: yusuf

customer_reviews.title: Superb headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Superb headphones, great sound quality and a good selection of accessories. Really bring out bass and top line, although a touch weak in the mid range. Still, overall a very highly recommended piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Emms

customer_reviews.title: Good top end
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. A lot of modern speakers/headphones seem to be bass focussed. These produce good bass, but importantly excellent reproduction in the mid range and top end. Although this may influenced by using them with a Sony hi def audio player. The downside is the limitations of mp3 compression are more obvious. (Busy re-formatting all recordings).
customer_reviews.author: Flumpy Bear

customer_reviews.title: ... after reading many positive reviews and have not been disappointed. They have a quality feel about them and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Headphones after reading many positive reviews and have not been disappointed. They have a quality feel about them and they have proved to be very comfortable. Sound quality and depth of sound outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: I. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Bit weak on mids and top end, bit heavy on the bass. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.text: Bit disappointing for me - too much bass and not enough mid/top. I gave up in the end and bought some Yamaha HPH-MT220 Headphones which are a bit more expensive but better. Will be ebaying the Sonys.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: As always with Sony amazing quality and value for money. Comfortable and brilliant sound.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bower

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I own many sets of headphones, costing up to £400, these are among my favorite. Great sound for the money, superb bass & treble for those who love R&B and modern jazz.
customer_reviews.author: BionicBoogie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound. Very comfy.slghtly warm sound which I find less fatieging easily better than akg k550 which sounded very boring and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Brava 210

customer_reviews.title: no noise cancelling at all
customer_reviews.text: great headphones, comfortable and the sound quality is great. possibly overemphasised bass component to sound and there is basically no noise cancelling at all, the music can be heard by the non wearer also so beware. decent pair of headphones all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: As comfortable as they are good to listen to
customer_reviews.text: As comfortable as they are good to listen to. The MDR-1As have a great balance of bass and treble, unlike usual headphones that seem to emphasise bass a little too much. They also come with a handy carry case and extra cable with a built in mic for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: iwan selway

customer_reviews.title: i allways loved Sony. And i didn't made a mistake with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have few pairs of headphones and i wanted one pair for " on the go " . Well , i always loved Sony . And i didn't made a mistake with this purchase . Good looking headphones and really good sound . Everything is already written here so there is no need to write long story . R
customer_reviews.author: La-Trec

customer_reviews.title: Build quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Previously had pair of kef m400 headphones they were lacking in bass and detail then came across sony MDR 1A headphones WOW sound was very good well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Danny94

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, comfortable,
customer_reviews.text: great sound signature, but arrived creaky and squeeky. I applied a dab of WD-40 to the joints which fixed the issue. All is well now. The sound is just so fun to listen to, any other headphones I use now are just underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Give it the right source and they will sing
customer_reviews.text: All the good things have already been said here. I bought these from Amazon Warehouse deals so for the price I paid these are better than good. The sound is crisp when given the right source. Ipod Touch 4th generation was pretty nice but going going to lossless via a quality DAB is what really made them stand out. No plans for upgrading soon with this sound.
customer_reviews.author: T. Naras

customer_reviews.title: Superb audio experience
customer_reviews.text: I have already had a couple of headsets in my life from the Nina me to the most prestigious brands and price tags, but this is standing out. The quality from packaging to the wearing is exceptional and the audio experience is simply stunning. I am glad with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Zollie

customer_reviews.title: Very good bass!
customer_reviews.text: Very good bass!! Not good if it's windy outside but in other cases noise isolation it's not bad overall, very good to watch movies as well, if you are interested in orchestral music these are not for you, I advice to buy 2 pairs of headphones, these ones for fun and a different one if you want more clarity on high frequencies
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Deaf no more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who wears a hearing aid and has serious problems hearing the dialogue from films on planes, for example. He says they are absolutely wonderful, and he can even wear them over his hearing aid. I would recommend these to anyone who has hearing difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Very special headphones. They don't overwhelm you with booms ...
customer_reviews.text: Very special headphones. They don't overwhelm you with booms & basses. Instead, you'll hear many new details in . Pure pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones, everything about them is quality the materials, the crisp sound throughout the range of high mids and lows no over powering bass, bass is smooth and pleasant really great head phones
customer_reviews.author: Richard burden

customer_reviews.title: Third pair of these I've ordered, lost first ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of these I've ordered, lost first ones on a plane, dropped second and broke badly, hopefully this is third time lucky! I've tried other cheaper and more expensive headsets since and before but sent them back as they just couldn't compare to the quality of the experience of these cans.
customer_reviews.author: Moff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in every aspect!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolutely incredible. They are extremely comfortable, look fantastic and sound amazing when listening to various types of music and just just as amazing when used whilst watching TV and movies. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, very good build quality & extremely comfortable to wear for long periods. I use them mainly plugged into my VR headset and also my IPad.
customer_reviews.author: R100ELL

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Headphones
customer_reviews.text: brilliant, sound is exceptional , well made, fit like a glove, I would call myself fussy when it comes to headphones but these rock
customer_reviews.author: black400

customer_reviews.title: i did send them back even if they were beautiful and sound correct for the price
customer_reviews.text: i did send them back even if they were beautiful and sound correct for the price....but too strong on bass for my tast
customer_reviews.author: franck p

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable headphones, let down by mediocre sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel lovely, very comfortable headphones, let down by mediocre sound quality. Do not stand up when compared to others around this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones To Date!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever had.. I have tested a good few but these are the best sounding and best feeling on the head headphones I have had the pleasure to own.. Nice and lightweight so no problem when using them for hours on end :)
customer_reviews.author: JD Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Cracking set of headphones. I trialled them in a local store and was concerned they might have to much bass but after a few months of listening I find they're great. They open up lower res audio tracks but come into their own with high res audio.
customer_reviews.author: The DarkPlight

customer_reviews.title: Not for the small headed
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be to big for my daughters head, they are quite a loose fit so beware if you have a small head! Can't fault the sound though and very comfortable. Great looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Windcaid

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very , Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The headset is really comfortable for long sessions (only issues as closed back is that it gets a bit warm in there). The sound is really nice and having it with Balanced cable makes them shine. The bass is big and strong while hearing everything else. I love this pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rz0n3

customer_reviews.title: Great portable 'phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use with my mobile rig (iPod Classic, Cypher Labs Algorythm Solo-R dac, Fiio E12 amp) and they are superb. I also use the excellent NAD HP-50 - the NAD's are possibly more 'accurate' (ie 'neutral') than the Sony's but it's very close. The Sony's simply sound great with everything from a string quartet to death metal. Plus the Sony build-quality is leagues ahead of the NAD 'phones, and they are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Dafydd M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones. They have the look and feel of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. They have the look and feel of something twice the price. They have the sound quality match and I have seldom heard better. Oh and did I mention comfort.........they are supremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased to have invested in these
customer_reviews.text: Very clear sound, smooth and clear. Personally i would prefer a slightly longer lead to reach sound system more easily, however 1 m seems to be industry standard
customer_reviews.author: Steve Monk

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good to me
customer_reviews.text: Has these for a while now and have been very pleased so far. Very comfortable, good quality feel to them and good sound!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of use the right earphone is a fraction of the volume of the left and the connection is very unreliable, not a problem if they were cheap headphones but with a RRP of £170 I expected much more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound even better.. But the best but is the comfort
customer_reviews.text: These look superb. They sound even better.. But the best but is the comfort.. They feel great on. A Longer lead would be nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Bubz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones!  Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Best headphones I've ever bought. Clean crisp sound, plenty of base if you tweak the EQ and very comfortable too. I would buy these again in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: B1gw1ll

customer_reviews.title: ... than any other brand comfort and sound quality are fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: After trying some of the other top brands i find the Sony MDR-1A prestige overhead headphones to be much more to my tastes than any other brand comfort and sound quality are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mc Bride

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful headphones.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints - second hand but very good. Couldn’t find any defects at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these headphones they are very comfortable and sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these headphones they are very comfortable and sound is good Hi-Fi quality a little strong on the bottom end otherwise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: very good, they were packaged very well and arrived very ...
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to replace my old 'phones, very good, they were packaged very well and arrived very quickly. great product!
customer_reviews.author: alan terry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these headphones on Prime Day, and got an awesome deal. The headphones sound awesome, very clear and precise audio throughout all frequencies! In the box there is the headphones, 2 cables (1 has a microphone, the other does not) and a neat little carry bag. Highly recommended for anyone that wants clear precise audio, in the convenient form of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Keating

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I love these - they are both comfortable and sound amazing, for any kind of music. The bass is good, and not overpowering, is the closest I've come to sounding like my subwoofer. There's also clarity where you can hear things you don't hear in other speakers.
customer_reviews.author: drscot-UK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable ('cause they're really soft) and sound great. Nice and bassy. Just bought another pair for at home.
customer_reviews.author: awaiting_vision

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent set of headphones great audio quality well worth owning a pair.
customer_reviews.author: P. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: ... TV late at night with these and I just love them. I wear spectacles and these are so ...
customer_reviews.text: I listen to TV late at night with these and I just love them. I wear spectacles and these are so comfortable to wear for hours and they sound wonderful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones! So light and comfortable. The sound quality is amazing. In a couple of days I will test it on a Hi-Res Audio device and for sure the sound quality will be even better. Really happy with my purchase. Happy listening!
customer_reviews.author: TimmY

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay.  Sony quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Sony enthusiast, clean, premium looking headphones, package comes with a spare cable and a protective leather alike bag. The sound is clean, the bass is...... That kinda of base everyone is looking when your not near your big speakers at home
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, fast delivery, good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a life of low-budget headphones, these headphones brought new life to my music collection. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mars Rib

customer_reviews.title: ... buy again if I grow another head there that good.
customer_reviews.text: will buy again if I grow another head there that good.
customer_reviews.author: alistair

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones, could do with larger cushions however, but then I do have large ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Semi Pro Studio monitor headphones...
customer_reviews.text: Audio 9 durability 8 edit: one of my cable was damaged after 1.5yrs..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just love this
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, great sound and very sturdy built. Can't be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. Cable issues though
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Very light and comfy for long listening sessions. Pairs really well with my Sony F series audio player. Shame that one of the cable stopped working in 3 months and second one in 5. Using a cable that my friend gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sound; very stylish Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very confortable; good sound; very stylish Cons: the bass sounds to heavy for me. But some may like that punchy sound
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Light. Great sound. Been wearing it the whole day and i don't feel a slight discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good to consider
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent headphones with high price tag though I enjoy listening.
customer_reviews.author: SATISH

customer_reviews.title: Plush and comfortable headphones (though cushioning does generate heat) and great sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Plush and comfortable headphones (though cushioning does generate heat) and great sound quality (you will hear new sounds on even the most familiar albums). Highly recommended if this the limit of your price range.
customer_reviews.author: GUC

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am no musicphile, but these seem to deliver really good sound. They are bit heavy to wear out and about, but I prefer the more unobtrusive earphones.
customer_reviews.author: dize

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones, I came from a pair of sony ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones, I came from a pair of sony zx610 and this is a huge change. Really good in all frecuences, high, med, low. Very confortable.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE MANUEL BARRIOS MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Seem pretty durable. Came with a neat bag to put them in when not in use and a couple of different cables.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wesson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Brilliant sound. You would be mad not to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephjant

customer_reviews.title: utterly fantastic
customer_reviews.text: amazing headphones. perfect for my video editing. its also great for casual listening as i now hear sounds i would of otherwise missed. it doesn't hurt your ears from noise distortion as there is hardly any. great i would recommend
customer_reviews.author: michael emmins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones in this price range I had, very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: L M SOBIEPANSKI

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: amazing comfort amazing sound quality base is a little bit loose but barely noticeable cables are supple and premium build quality is top notch
customer_reviews.author: Eoghan P. O'Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. Cable a bit short but that's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Roukin77

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality headphones. The sound is loud but not without losing clarity and they are very comfortable to wear. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best most comfortable headphones money can buy!!! i've tried alllottt!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lawrence-watson

customer_reviews.title: 1A. Its A1 grade!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and its totally brand new and sealed. Great music and its the precursor to my next cans, z7
customer_reviews.author: VIVAVAIO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it, it's only having moderate treble but overall it has a very good listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the Amazon used section. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I got them from the used section from Amazon and I can't find any sort of wear or scratch on them, saved myself £60 too.
customer_reviews.author: Richard David Smeaton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but needs an amp to get full power
customer_reviews.author: Jorge miguel lopes godinho

product_meta.title: Sony MDR-1A Prestige Overhead Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Sony MDR 1A - Kopfhörer mit Mikrofon - Full-Size - Schwarz

BOX CONTAINS
Headphones
Headphone Cable 1.2m
Headphone Cable with inline Remote 1.2m
Warranty Card
feature_bullets: Responsive liquid crystal polymer driver for clarity. Frequency Response- 3–100,000Hz
Beat response control reduces heavy bass distortion
Foldable ear cups for easy portability
